p: A total of 48 male BALB/c mice (6–8 weeks old) weighing from 20 to 25 g were used in this study. Mice were housed in a colony room with a 12:12 h light/ dark cycle at 21 ± 2 °C and maintained with free access to water and feeding ad libitum. Mice were handled based on the standard protocols for the use of laboratory animals [ 37].
